FINANCE, STOCK MARKET used to describe financial markets, shares, etc. where prices have fallen too far in relation to their real value: Stocks are in an oversold position right now. We have seen a dramatic recovery from the ridiculously oversold levels of last March. Compare
overbought
undersold
